attributes.action: Present bill to Parliament to make all Monuments in England National treasures.
attributes.additional_details: No local official can make a determination without approval from Parliament. The landmarks of this great country have been under attack. Tourism being our largest revenue stream, these monuments shall not be disturbed without an exceptional reason.
attributes.background:
To make all monuments in England, including London, National Treasures. No Monument of any historical figure is to be defaced, removed or desecrated without prior parliamentary approval. 
Conviction of offense should be punishable, up to and including incarceration and financially responsibility.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Protect all monuments and statues from being taken down: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325814

Make it a specific offence to desecrate national flags, symbols and monuments: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325545
